task.title: Packaging changes
task.shortdesc: This task describes how to package in a single tar/jar file all of your models, data and routines of your workspace.

taskbody.prereq: You must have already created your packager project from the new Design Studio project template. Please refer to the section
taskbody.context: This takes place when you have locally tested your configuration, ready to be installed in another environment.

step.cmd:
Right-click on the [Prefix]-packager\Launch T24 Packager (TAFJ).launch file and select
Run As Launch T24 Packager (TAFJ)
step.stepresult: Log is displayed in the Console View

taskbody.result:
After successful build, a file is created in the [MyPrefix]-packager\target .
Tar file for TAFC
Jar file for TAFJ
This generated file is ready to be installed on same T24 version:
For TAFC: on environment on Windows platform.
For TAFJ: on any environment
